level.description: Another color in the database is bugged. Use the <color=#00ff00ff>COMMENTER</color> tool to see which colors don't affect the bug. Check the RGB values and use the BUGCATCHER to catch the bug.
level.introtext: Now it's time to use the <color=#00ff00ff>COMMENTER</color> tool. There are many colors to check in a short duration. The <color=#00ff00ff>COMMENTER</color> tool can speed things up. Use it to Divide-and-Conquer!
level.endtext: That bug was tricky to find. Well done!
level.code:
